articles.title: Review: Beyoncé Renaissance World Tour Begins in Stockholm - Vulture
articles.description: Concert review and scene report from Stockholm, where Beyoncé’s Renaissance tour started on May 9. This is Beyoncé’s first tour in six years and the Beyhive traveled there to hear her play songs from Renaissance and albums throughout her catalog.
articles.content: There is a certain hierarchy between Wednesday, night one of Beyoncés Renaissance world tour, and Thursday, night two of Beyoncés Renaissance world tour. I heard it first on the Delta flight from JFK… [+13589 chars]
